overview: Julian Gil and Zully Montero star in this Christian-themed, Spanish-language drama -- told through two parallel narratives -- about the Virgin Mary's inspirational power. In late 17th century Mexico, a Cacique Indian accepts a message from Mary, who commands him to be baptized. Meanwhile, at the home of an affluent aristocrat, the man's recently paralyzed daughter looks to the virgin for hope and healing.
title: The Virgin of Coromoto
